name: tiles town
description:
Explore a town made out of Domino tiles and talk to its inhabitants.

This is another "town with npcs" game made for Bitsy Jam #70, the theme was "chain reaction", the theme was more like a starting point for me. I was inspired by domino tiles so my mind went immediatly to the beautiful Playstation game "No One Can Stop Mr. Domino!" and the cute domino tiles design. I also imagined how their houses would look and for the first time I drew the map outside of Bitsy with Pixelorama which was a huge step for me. It's game very similar to who ate all the fish in which you just explore a small "jrpg" town and get to know all the various NPCs.
